original_title: Ella Fitzgerald: Best of the BBC Vaults
overview: BBC archivists recently unearthed a veritable treasure trove of Ella Fitzgerald shows recorded by the BBC.  Featuring two shows from 1965, and a performance live at Ronnie Scottâ€™s from 1974; this is the timeless Ella Fitzgerald.
title: Ella Fitzgerald: Best of the BBC Vaults
